destinations.Activities: take a photo with AboElhol(spinx) and with the pyramids take your breakfast at a site of pyramits
destinations.Attractions: see the three famous pyramit (Khufu, khafre, Menkaure)
destinations.Includes: Tour guide, Air-conditioned vehicle, Entry tickets
destinations.description: The Giza Pyramid Complex is one of the most iconic archaeological sites in the world and a timeless symbol of ancient Egyptian civilization. Home to the Great Pyramid of Khufu—one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World—it stands as a remarkable achievement of engineering, architecture, and human ambition.  Located on the Giza Plateau near Cairo, the site includes the pyramids of Khufu, Khafre, and Menkaure, along with the Great Sphinx, creating a unique historical landscape that has fascinated travelers for centuries. Visitors can explore the monumental structures, learn about ancient burial rituals, and experience the mysteries surrounding their construction.  Today, the Giza Pyramids remain a must-visit destination for tourists from around the globe, offering an unforgettable journey into Egypt’s rich history, culture, and enduring legacy.
destinations.name: Giza Pyramids
destinations.shortDescription: One of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World and a world-famous archaeological site

destinations.Activities: Guided historical tours with Egyptologists  Walking through the Great Hypostyle Hall and exploring its massive columns  Visiting the Sacred Lake and learning about ancient rituals  Exploring the Avenue of Sphinxes connecting Karnak to Luxor Temple  Attending the Sound and Light Show at night  Photography of monumental architecture and detailed hieroglyphs  Exploring open courtyards, pylons, and chapels of different pharaohs  Learning about ancient Egyptian religion and temple ceremonies  Enjoying cultural and educational tours for students and researchers  Relaxing walks around the temple complex and surrounding areas
destinations.Attractions: The Great Hypostyle Hall  Temple of Amun-Ra  The Sacred Lake  The Avenue of Sphinxes  Massive pylons and monumental gateways  Colossal statues of pharaohs
destinations.BestTimeToVisit: October to April: Best overall time, with mild and comfortable weather
destinations.description: The Karnak Temple Complex is the largest religious complex in ancient Egypt and one of the most impressive sacred sites ever built. Dedicated primarily to the god Amun-Ra, it features vast courtyards, towering pylons, massive columns, and colossal statues that reflect the power and devotion of ancient Egyptian civilization.  Located in Luxor, Karnak was developed over more than two thousand years by successive pharaohs, making it a living record of Egypt’s religious and political history. The Great Hypostyle Hall, with its enormous stone columns, is one of the most breathtaking architectural achievements in the ancient world.  Today, the Karnak Temple Complex is a major tourist attraction, offering visitors a powerful insight into ancient Egyptian beliefs, monumental architecture, and the grandeur of a civilization that shaped human history.
destinations.name: Karnak Temple
destinations.shortDescription: The largest religious complex in ancient Egypt with massive columns and statues

destinations.Activities: Snorkeling and scuba diving in coral reefs  Glass-bottom boat trips  Desert safari (quad biking & camel rides)  Boat cruises to Tiran Island  Parasailing and water sports  Shopping and dining at Naama Bay  Nightlife and entertainment shows
destinations.Attractions: Ras Mohammed National Park  Naama Bay  SOHO Square  Sharks Bay  Tiran Island  Old Market (Sharm El Maya)  Farsha Café (cliffside views)
destinations.BestTimeToVisit: March–May & September–November: Perfect balance for beaches and diving
destinations.Includes: Airport pick-up and drop-off  Accommodation in a 4★ or 5★ seaside resort  Daily breakfast (all-inclusive option available)  Guided city tour of Sharm El Sheikh  Snorkeling or diving trip in the Red Sea  Visit to Ras Mohammed National Park  Boat trip to Tiran Island  Desert safari experience (quad bike & camel ride)  Transportation for all scheduled tours  Professional tour guide  All taxes and service charges included
destinations.description: Sharm El Sheikh is a famous tourist city known for its world-class resorts, stunning beaches, and exceptional diving spots. Located on the Red Sea, it offers crystal-clear waters, colorful coral reefs, and rich marine life, making it a top destination for snorkeling and scuba diving enthusiasts.  The city combines natural beauty with modern amenities, featuring luxury hotels, vibrant nightlife, and relaxing seaside experiences. Popular areas such as Naama Bay and Ras Mohammed National Park attract visitors from around the world.  Sharm El Sheikh is an ideal destination for leisure, adventure, and relaxation, offering a perfect blend of sun, sea, and unforgettable Red Sea experiences.
destinations.name: sharm El sheikh
destinations.shortDescription: A famous tourist city known for resorts, beaches, and diving spots.
